abstract.p: Names of nine Americans newly confirmed dead in Iraq; 3,302 American service members have died since start of war

block.p: The Department of Defense has identified 3,302 American service members who have died since the start of the Iraq war. It confirmed the deaths of the following Americans yesterday:
BLUE, Shaun M., 25, First Lt., Marines; Munster, Ind.; First Marine Division.
DELATORRE, Jesse D., 29, Lance Cpl., Marines; Aurora, Ill.; First Marine Division.
DeLEON, Mario K., 26, Sgt., Army; San Francisco; First Infantry Division.
GENEVIE, Aaron M., 22, Pfc., Army; Chambersburg, Pa.; First Infantry Division.
SCHERRY, Daniel R., 20, Lance Cpl., Marines; Rocky River, Ohio; Second Marine Division.
SCHMIT, Joshua A., 26, Sgt., Army; Willmar, Minn.; 1451st Transportation Company, 13th Support Command.
STARCEVICH, Lucas V., 25, Pfc., Army; Canton, Ill.; First Infantry Division.
WALBERG, Steven J., 18, Pfc., Army; Paradise, Calif.; First Infantry Division.
WALLACE, Brandon L., 27, Sgt., Army; St. Louis; 1451st Transportation Company, 13th Support Command.
The Department of Defense has identified 3,302 American service members who have died since the start of the Iraq war. It confirmed the deaths of the following Americans yesterday:.
